TITLE Apple Pie

* Apple pie as made for Thanksgiving 2023

{[Filling]
# Peal and slice apples into quarter inch slices to create [775 g [sliced] apples]. 
* About 7 large apples
# In a large bowl combine apples with [115 g sugar], [1/4 tsp salt], [1/2 tsp cinnamon], [1/8 tsp nutmeg], [1 tbl lemon juice]. Stir.
# Maccerate apples for 30 minutes.
# Stir in [15 g tapioca starch]
}

{[Pie dough]
* Gold medal blue label four
# In a bowl combine [225 g flour], [4 g salt], [15 g sugar]. Stir well.
# Cut [225 g butter] into 3/4 inch cubes and add to flour mix.
# Crush butter cubes to form large flat layers.
# Add [115 g cold water]. Mix to form dough.
# Knead gently to combine.
# On a floured surface roll into rectangle. 
# Fold in thirds in one direction and then in half in the other.
# Subdivide in half. Rollout and chill.
} 

# Fill the pie and crimp dough. Refrigerate for 30 minutes.
# Preheat oven to 400 F.
# Bake for until golden and filling reaches 195 F.
